Package org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.scf

The SCF package can encode and decode Chromatograms in SCF format first described in Dear, S and Staden, R. "A standard file format for data from DNA sequencing instruments", DNA Sequence 3, 107-110, (1992).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PrivateData
    PrivateData is a wrapper around a byte array for additional optional data in an scf file.
    ScfChromatogram
    ScfChromatogram is a SCF specific implementation of Chromatogram.
    ScfChromatogramFileVisitor
    ScfChromatogramFileVisitor is a ChromatogramFileVisitor that has additional visitXXX methods for SCF specific fields.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ScfChromatogramBuilder
    SCFChromatogramBuilder uses the Builder pattern to create a new ScfChromatogram instance.
    ScfChromatogramParser
    ScfChromatogramParser parses SCF encoded Chromatogram files.
    ScfChromatogramWriterBuilder  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ScfDecoderException
    SCFParserException is a subclass of IOException which is used if an SCF file fails to parse.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.scf Description

The SCF package can encode and decode Chromatograms in SCF format first described in Dear, S and Staden, R. "A standard file format for data from DNA sequencing instruments", DNA Sequence 3, 107-110, (1992). The Current SCF File Format Specification can be viewed
Author:
dkatzel
See Also:
Current SCF File Format Specification
